solution_line_template: The price of the book is down by: {original_price}*{price_decrease_percent} = $<<{original_price}*{price_decrease_percent}={price_decrease_amount}>>{price_decrease_amount}.
So the new price of the movie ticket is: {original_price} - {price_decrease_amount} = $<<{original_price}-{price_decrease_amount}={new_price}>>{new_price}.
